channel.title: Mysterious ruins rep++
channel.description: Kay, really weird problem. So for the air rune altar, it has an enter option. Id is [code]2452.[/code] All the other altars are ids 7000 and above, and are messed up. They have the enter option, but the altars glowing doesn't look right. I tried adding the client sided Enter, but that didn't work, and I have done it for multiple other objects. I KNOW that I had the correct id when doing it. Any ideas?

item.title: Mysterious ruins rep++
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

base? then its internal and most likely cache related and cant be fixed with hardcoding

Read full topic

item.title: Mysterious ruins rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

gara494:

ahhh i know! go to where the altar is in the actual server, like actually tele to the altar in front of the wildi, click it, and the id will come up in command prompt

Only the air altar is clickable. All the others that load on the server have only the examine option, and I adding the option client sided won’t work.

Read full topic

Kay, really weird problem. So for the air rune altar, it has an enter option. Id is 2452. All the other altars are ids 7000 and above, and are messed up. They have the enter option, but the altars glowing doesn’t look right. I tried adding the client sided Enter, but that didn’t work, and I have done it for multiple other objects. I KNOW that I had the correct id when doing it. Any ideas?

What’s the problem exactly?

For all the ids that are AFTER 2452, they glow correctly but don’t have the enter option.
[/quote]

Do they have any other options?[/quote]

Only examine.

Read full topic

item.title: Mysterious ruins rep++
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

This is why:

When jagex made the alters on runescape, they made two of each, one for a player wielding a tiara and one for one with a talasmin. All the alters without enter and are 7000+ are those, and the 2452 air alter is the “tiara” altar. Simply find the ids of the other alters. Theyre probably close, or the next ids after 2452

Read full topic
